name: Cat Boy Creator
description:
Ever wanted to create your very own cat boy? Now you can with the official CloudNovel® Cat Boy Creator! Customize your cat boy or "neko kun" to create the cat boy of your dreams!

Features


  • 2 Variation School Uniforms
  • 4 Interchangeable Hairstyles
  • 5+ Different facial expressions
  • Saving your character as a transparent .PNG image
